Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET1 WHERE FORMATOD1ACODI = :FORMATOD1ACODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ANIO

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1ADET1 ( FORMATOD1ADET1CODI, FORMATOD1ACODI, ANIO, DEMANDAENERGIA, DEMANDAHP, DEMANDAHFP, DEMANDACARGA, GENERACIONENERGIA, GENERACIONHP, GENERACIONHFP, DEMANDANETAHP, DEMANDANETAHFP, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1ADET1CODI, :FORMATOD1ACODI, :ANIO, :DEMANDAENERGIA, :DEMANDAHP, :DEMANDAHFP, :DEMANDACARGA, :GENERACIONENERGIA, :GENERACIONHP, :GENERACIONHFP, :DEMANDANETAHP, :DEMANDANETAHFP, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1ADET1 SET ANIO = :ANIO, DEMANDAENERGIA = :DEMANDAENERGIA, DEMANDAHP = :DEMANDAHP, DEMANDAHFP = :DEMANDAHFP, DEMANDACARGA = :DEMANDACARGA, GENERACIONENERGIA = :GENERACIONENERGIA, GENERACIONHP = :GENERACIONHP, GENERACIONHFP = :GENERACIONHFP, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1ADET1CODI = :FORMATOD1ADET1CODI

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1ADET1 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1ACODI IN (SELECT FORMATOD1ACODI FROM CAM_FORMATOD1A WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0' ) AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET1 WHERE FORMATOD1ADET1CODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET1 ORDER BY FORMATOD1ADET1CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
